bibl.author: Јакшић, Ђура
bibl.title: Дела Ђуре Јакишића III : Приповетке I - Чичаа Тима (стр. 295-397)

bibl.author: Јакшић, Ђура
bibl.title: Чича Тима : приповетка из учитељског живота

encodingDesc.p: This edition for ELTeC was prepared on the basis of the ELTeC level-1 version. Tokenisation and sentence segmentation performed with Unitex corpus processing suite, and morphosyntactic tagging and lemmatisation with TreeTagger model trained for Srbian, integrated into TXM Version 0.8.1.Named entities were annotated with SrpNER , which uses Serbian morphological dictionaries implemented in Unitex.The produced NE tags were converted to the ELTEC set by Nerbeyond tool.

revisionDesc.change: IDs added to front and back matter
